## PointerAdaptorEvent interface

Event: Fired when when `PointerEvent`<!-- -->s are triggered

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PointerAdaptorEvent extends ContinuousEvent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ContinuousEvent](./controls.continuousevent.md)

## Example


```javascript
adaptor.on('trigger', (e) => {
  console.log('x/y coordinates', e.values.x, e.values.y)
})

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deltas](./controls.pointeradaptorevent.deltas.md) | Coordinates | Pointer coordinate change since previous update |
|  [pointerCount](./controls.pointeradaptorevent.pointercount.md) | number | Number of pointers registered |
|  [values](./controls.pointeradaptorevent.values.md) | Coordinates | Dampened x and y pointer coordinates |
